name: Robotic Combat Project VCS
description:
Warning: flashing imagery.

Press the 1 key to reset the level you're on

Survive the Robotic Combat Unit (RCU) uprising as you make your way through the city. You must shoot the robots and their tanks to advance towards the tunnels at the end of each level.

controlls:

Press the 1 key to reset the level you're on

left/right arrow keys to move
up arrow key to jump
down arrow key to duck
spacebar to shoot
